title: SkiaSharp 3.x does not work on RHEL 8
body:
### Description

After updating the versions of Debian used to build the Linux artifacts, RHEL 8 no longer works.

This is because Debian 11 uses a newer version of glibc that the 2.28 used by RHEL 8.

### Code

N/A

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

_No response_

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp
